settings.title: Nothing Beats this Powerbase!
settings.content: It just has everything! You can adjust the full Powerbase Pro, and you get it with voice control features, usb charging ports, nights lights, and full body massage features. I've had this for over a month now and I'm still discovering something new every night!

settings.title: Love the Presets!
settings.content: I have a specific preferred inclination each for reading, watching TV, and sleeping. At first I was worried about manually setting up the angles for those every night, but when I discovered the preset feature, those worries completely disappeared!

settings.title: Keeps Me in Bed!
settings.content: I usually go to my study desk to work, but after purchasing the Emma Powerbase, it became so much easier to just work from the comfort of my bed. I even started to read books from my bed too!

settings.tab_content_1:
Unlock the best sleep experience with the Emma Powerbase Pro. With full body adjustability, zero gravity, and massage features, the Pro redefines the idea of customizing of your sleep.

  • Complete full body-adjustable features to improve your sleep setup
  • Zero gravity, massage, and up to 3 preset position options.
  • Tons of accessory features including dual USB charging ports, voice control command options, and night lights
  • Compatible with all Emma mattresses, and the Emma Upholstered Platform
  • Comes with 12" stackable leg options to function as a standalone base, or to adjust to the height of your current bed frame
settings.tab_content_2:
Unlock the best sleep experience with the Emma Powerbase Pro. With full body adjustability, zero gravity, and massage features, the Pro redefines the idea of customizing of your sleep.

  • Great for sleepers who want to fully customize their sleep experience.
  • Active sleepers who like to work, read, or watch TV from their beds.

settings.title: A base that follows your lead
settings.content: Easily take control with our smart control system. The user-friendly wireless remote and presets are paired with offline voice control technology—allowing you to customize your sleep experience with ease.

settings.title: Perfectly positioned
settings.content: This adjustable base comes with head and foot presets, allowing your bed to be in the perfect position. From watching TV to a zero-gravity sleep experience, this base has got you covered.

settings.title: Holistic sleep experience
settings.content: Apart from advanced ergonomic and control features, the Powerbase Pro comes with additional features such as massage motors, underbed lighting, and dual USB charging ports.

settings.title: How do I set up the Emma Powerbase Pro?
settings.content:
You can set up the Emma Powerbase Pro as a stand alone base, to fit within an existing bed frame, or on top of your existing platform.

As a stand alone option, simply attach the 12" stackable legs to the bottom of the base, connect the frame to a powersource, and you're good to go!

To fit within an existing bed frame, check the height of your bed frame, and adjust the height of each stackable leg accordingly. Afterwards, remove any slats from your existing bedframe before placing the Emma Powerbase Pro inside.

To go on top of your existing bed frame, just make sure that your current platform can support the weight of the Emma Powerbase Pro. If it can, feel free to place it on top of your platform. Currently, our Upholstered Platform is compatible with the Emma Powerbase.

settings.title: What are the features the Emma Powerbase Pro offers?
settings.content:
The Emma Powerbase Pro offers full body adjustability on your mattress.

Complete with a Wireless Remote and Voice Activation features, the Emma Powerbase Pro also comes with built in presets, zero gravity features, and massage options for a more relaxing sleep experience.

settings.title: How do I take care of the Emma Powerbase Pro?
settings.content:
- Remember to evenly distribute your weight when using your adjustable base.

- Lower your Emma Powerbase Pro to the flat (horizontal) position in between presets and after use.

- If spills occur, you could wipe it off with a moist towel, but be careful not to wipe over any electrical components. Be sure to dry the Powerbase Pro after cleaning.

settings.title: Do you have a trial period for this product? How about a warranty period?
settings.content: Because of the complexity of the Emma Powerbase Pro, we do not have an ongoing trial period offer with it. However, we guarantee each Emma Powerbase Pro purchase under a 10 Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty, so rest assured that your product will be fully functional and ready to use.

settings.title: Shipping, Warranty, & Returns
settings.content:
Free Delivery

We work with UPS & FedEx to ship your Emma products straight from our warehouse to your front door.

Free Returns

Because of the complexity of the Emma Powerbase Pro, we unfortunately do not have an ongoing trial period offer with it.

10-Year Limited Warranty

Enjoy a 10-Year Limited Manufacturer Warranty for each Emma Powerbase Pro purchase. Of course, we've made the warranty claims process of any unsuitable items super easy. Just contact our customer service and we'll take care of the rest.

If you would like to contact us, please feel free to email our support team at support@emma-sleep.com or call them at +1-855-580-3662.
